channel.title: innodb on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in innodb on Barefoot Rob

item.title: foreign key
item.description: 09:39 Thursday 10 November 2016 JST I just added my first foreign key constraint in a DB using INNODB tables. These are two new tables I’ve created to get around the size limits of localstorage. One more table coming soon, and then I’ll have moved everything from localstorage to DB.
